the engine will constantly check which files are being written format, title, source url and other attributes in common. from the checking mechanism will suggest the directory where the user will save your file.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.search for standard directories.
2.Build of user database of "standard directories"
3.Sujest to user a save directorie for save your file.
